member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_DISPLAYABLE
member.summary: Describes the level of displayable surfaces supported in the current graphics driver. See Displayable surfaces.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_DISPLAYABLE.DisplayableTexture
member.summary: true if the driver supports displayable surfaces; otherwise, false.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_DISPLAYABLE.SharedResourceTier
member.summary: The level of support for shared resources in the current graphics driver.
